timeline.message: Licence reformat issue fix and system exception issue handle
Code changes for branding related chnages for URLs,images and text
Internal QA Issue Fixes for branding related changes
Merge branch 'early-access' of https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/fda-mystudies into early-access-build
Email Content changes for post registration email as part of branding changes
Removed fda content from the property file for privacy and terms
Email Content changes as part of branding change for Password related mails
Merge branch 'early-access' into early-access-build

timeline.bodyText:
@jkrogers18 do think we need a copyright message to be displayed in the footer of the app for all new organizations?
nit: if yes, we should change the year to 2020
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,7 +2,7 @@
- Copyright � 2017 FDATermsPrivacy Policy + Copyright � 2017 <Org Name>TermsPrivacy Policy

replies.bodyText: Let's just remove the copyright footer everywhere. We have the copyright information in the code itself and I think this just introduces another place where a configuration mistake can occur.
replies.author: jkrogers18

timeline.bodyText:
We would prefer the use of Application over app.
Having said, I am not clear as to why "Manage Gateway Notifications" has been changed to "App-level"?
Please explain what this action is supposed to do?
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,7 +15,7 @@
          <!-- widgets section-->        
          <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 p-none">
             <div class="black-lg-f">
-                Manage Gateway Notifications
+                App-level

replies.bodyText:
This was a mistake Zohreh, it should have been changed to Manage App-level Notifications.  Have asked the developer to correct it.
And the reason for the change is that, the platform now supports multiple gateway apps and not just one.
App is a term commonly used around the platform to denote the mobile app vs other web-based applications. Connotation-wise people understand 'app' as a mobile app. Please let us know if we should still change to 'application'.
replies.author: SR-btc

timeline.bodyText:
please remove this content.
All branding content should be either usable out of the box or left empty.
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@ +

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered +alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly +believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't +anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the +Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator +on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of +model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. +The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, +injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.

timeline.bodyText: simislar to privacy, please remove fake content.
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@ +

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. +Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, +when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type +specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into +electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. +It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing +Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like +Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

timeline.message: Merge branch 'early-access' into early-access-build
Merge branch 'early-access' into early-access-build

Removed unused duplicated property and modified/removed respective java files depending on those properties.Also handle few of the WCP branding changes. Along with modified ActivityLog Bo class as newly added few properties are not part of the current scope.
issue fixes based on recent branding related PR comments

Code push with below changes.
1. Copyright footer text updated to placeholder text
2. Set of text changes in WCP (based on internal review as well as Zohreh's comments)
3. Remove the FISMA popup in WCP sign in
4. Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy pages - updated lorem epsum content to placeholder content
5. Removal/Modified of some more content and branding elements from the code that were specific to previous implementations of FDA MyStudies and duplicated contents.
Modifed classes that are dependent ActivityLog BO class

Thanks for reaching out for password help for your <Org Name> MyStudies Management Portal user account.

Please use the link given below, along with the Access Code provided, to set up a new password.

Access Code: $accessCode

Please note that the link and Access Code can be used only once and is valid for a period of 48 hours only.

For any questions or assistance, please write to $customerCareMail.

This is to inform you that one or more details of a user's account has been updated by administrator $sessionAdminFullName in the <Org Name> Health Study Management Portal. The user's current registered email is $userEmail and the account status is $userStatus.

The user may be required to sign in to the portal again in case he/she was currently in an active session.

Note: You are receiving this email because you are the Account Manager for the portal. In case you see this update as unusual or unintended activity, please sign in to the app and exercise the 'Enforce Password Change' option for this user.



Thanks,
The <Org Name> MyStudies Support Team

timeline.message: Merge branch 'early-access' into early-access-build

Set of text changes in WCP (based on internal review as well as based on Zohreh's comments)
Merge branch 'early-access-build' of https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/fda-mystudies into early-access-build
Remove the FISMA popup in WCP sign in issue fix based on internal QA

This reverts commit 396909470cc1642b27940699826986c8786e1740.
